Stixbox Function

NOM

    test1n - Tests and confidence intervals based on a normal sample

SEQUENCE D'APPEL

[pval, cimean, cisigma] = test1n(x,cl)

PARAMETRES

    • x : sample (column vector)
    • cl : confidence level for the confidence intervals (default 0.95).
    • pval : probability that Student variate based on x is as far from 0 as it is actually, or further away under hypothesis that theoretical mean is 0.
    • cimean : confidence interval for the mean.
    • cisigma : confidence interval for the standard deviation. (Confidence intervals of the form [LeftLimit, PointEstimate, RightLimit]).

DESCRIPTION

    Tests and confidence intervals based on a normal sample
